EmailTemplate.description: This template is to send set password email for the community users
EmailTemplate.name: Fleetguard_Welcome_Setpassword
EmailTemplate.subject: Fleetguard Online Account Created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cummins
Dear {!Receiving_User.Name},
Your Fleetguard Online account has been successfully created. The username for your account is {!Receiving_User.Username}. Please click the button below to setup your new password.
If you have any question or concerns, please contact your Fleetguard account representative or Customer Support. If you have trouble clicking on the button, please click here.
